item.title: Notes on ICLR 2018
item.description: I recently attended ICLR 2018, as I had a workshop article accepted. Please, consider taking a look: A differentiable BLEU loss. Analysis and first results. This was the first time I attended a conference, so I tried to learn as much as I could. These are some random notes about how the conference works and what people talked about. How the conference works ICLR is an artificial intelligence conference that uses a double-blind peer review process via OpenReview.
